LanguageData.kathanon.InvisibleGhosts.ShowPlace.title: Show when placing new
LanguageData.kathanon.InvisibleGhosts.ShowPlace.desc: Blueprints will always be shown while placing a new blueprint.
LanguageData.kathanon.InvisibleGhosts.ShowArchitect.d: Blueprints will always be shown if the Architect menu is open.
LanguageData.kathanon.InvisibleGhosts.Selectable.desc: Currently hidden blueprints can be selected either by clicking or dragging as usual.
LanguageData.kathanon.InvisibleGhosts.Tools.title: Cancel affects hidden blueprints
LanguageData.kathanon.InvisibleGhosts.Tools.desc: The Cancel command from the Architect menu will affect any blueprints that are currently hidden.
LanguageData.kathanon.InvisibleGhosts.OnlyFloors.desc: Hiding blueprints only affects blueprints for floors.
